image_description: A stack of thick books with chapters visibly divided is shown split into smaller pieces, with each piece having a part label. The art style is flat, academic illustration with solid colors of blue, black and white.
image_phrases: stack of books, chapters, split into pieces, segmentation
body_texts: To enable alignment between the book chapters and movie scenes, both modalities are segmented into smaller coherent chunks. The book chapters are split into paragraphs based on punctuation and other delimiters. The movie scenes are partitioned based on shot boundaries and subtitles. This segmentation allows for finer-grained alignment between textual paragraphs and visual scenes.
